title: Biopharma raises $100M for crypto treasury to back cancer treatment
summary: Propanc Biopharma said it will build a crypto treasury after securing up to $100 million from Hexstone Capital to further its potential cancer treatment and reignite investor interest.

title: Uniswap token jumps 38% after fee switch, burn proposal hits the table
summary: The Uniswap token rose over 38% after the introduction of a protocol fee switch and burning mechanism that could strengthen UNI.

title: Senate Committee unveils crypto market structure bill draft
summary: The Senate Agriculture Committee has released a draft bill outlining the regulatory jurisdiction of the country’s two main financial market regulators.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
summary: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Bitdeer shares drop 20% after posting $266M quarterly loss
summary: Bitdeer’s revenue and Bitcoin production jumped in the third quarter amid a push into AI, but its shares slid after the company booked paper losses.

title: US opens door for crypto ETFs, trusts to earn staking rewards
summary: Guidance from the Internal Revenue Service appeared to offer additional regulatory clarity for crypto staking through exchange-traded products.

title: EToro stock jumps on Q3 results, $150M buyback plan
summary: The company posted $20.8 billion in client assets, a 48% increase in profit, and plans for a $150 million share buyback program.

title: Rumble to buy crypto miner Northern Data after Tether investment
summary: Reports said that the AI infrastructure purchase would be valued at about $767 million as part of a stock deal, about three months after a planned acquisition with Tether.

title: Bitcoin ‘double bottom’ eyes $110K, but CME gap may postpone rally
summary: A bullish breakout lifts Bitcoin toward $110,000, but a stablecoin build-up and looming CME gaps signal caution.

title: Bitcoin’s next move could shock traders if BTC price breaks above $112K
summary: A Bitcoin rally through $112,000 could be brewing. Cointelegraph explains why the pending release of US economic data and the end of the government shutdown are good for BTC.
